    public MyStack()
    {

        {
            Location = azurerm_resource_group.Example.Location,
            ResourceGroupName = azurerm_resource_group.Example.Resource_group_name,
            VirtualHubId = azurerm_virtual_hub.Example.Id,

        });
    }

}
